title: Learning Chinese Typography
content:
Hi guys i am currently looking into chinese type, here's a great tryout website for the different types...just simply key in any character and chose the font from the choices below!

[http://www.youmade.com/font/index.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418201031/http:/www.youmade.com/font/index.asp "http://www.youmade.com/font/index.asp")
author: compat88
